_metadata.name: PhotonPath Tissue Optical Properties Database
_metadata.author: Compiled from literature
_metadata.description: Extended optical properties database with tumors, organs, and specialized tissues

references.jacques_2013: Jacques SL. Optical properties of biological tissues: a review. Phys Med Biol. 2013;58(11):R37-R61
references.sandell_2011: Sandell JL, Zhu TC. A review of in-vivo optical properties of human tissues. J Biophotonics. 2011;4(11-12):773-787
references.bashkatov_2011: Bashkatov AN, et al. Optical properties of human skin, subcutaneous and mucous tissues. J Phys D Appl Phys. 2005;38(15):2543
references.yaroslavsky_2002: Yaroslavsky AN, et al. Optical properties of selected native and coagulated human brain tissues. Phys Med Biol. 2002;47(12):2059
references.vanderZee_1993: Van der Zee P, et al. Optical properties of brain tissue. Proc SPIE. 1993;1888:454-465
references.cheong_1990: Cheong WF, et al. A review of the optical properties of biological tissues. IEEE J Quantum Electron. 1990;26(12):2166-2185

brain_gray_matter.name: Brain Gray Matter
brain_gray_matter.description: Cerebral cortex gray matter, high neuronal density

brain_white_matter.name: Brain White Matter
brain_white_matter.description: Myelinated axon bundles, high scattering due to myelin

skin_epidermis.name: Skin Epidermis
skin_epidermis.description: Outer skin layer, contains melanin, no blood vessels

skin_dermis.name: Skin Dermis
skin_dermis.description: Inner skin layer with blood vessels, collagen fibers

blood_oxygenated.name: Blood (Oxygenated)
blood_oxygenated.description: Arterial blood with high oxygen saturation (>95%)

blood_deoxygenated.name: Blood (Deoxygenated)
blood_deoxygenated.description: Venous blood with lower oxygen saturation (~70%)

liver.name: Liver
liver.description: Hepatic tissue, high blood content and mitochondria

bone_cortical.name: Cortical Bone
bone_cortical.description: Dense outer bone layer, hydroxyapatite crystals

heart_myocardium.name: Heart Myocardium
heart_myocardium.description: Cardiac muscle tissue, high myoglobin content

retina.name: Retina
retina.description: Neural tissue lining the eye, photoreceptors

spinal_cord.name: Spinal Cord
spinal_cord.description: Central nervous system, mix of white and gray matter

tumor_glioblastoma.name: Glioblastoma (Brain Tumor)
tumor_glioblastoma.description: High-grade malignant brain tumor, increased scattering

tumor_melanoma.name: Melanoma Tumor
tumor_melanoma.description: Pigmented melanoma with high melanin content

hemoglobin_oxy.name: Oxyhemoglobin (HbO2)
hemoglobin_oxy.note: Extinction coefficient in cm^-1/(mol/L), multiply by concentration

fat.name: Lipid/Fat
fat.note: Peaks in nm, significant absorption in NIR
